text: The 2007 Southern District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 17 elected members to the 21-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:11.77%;" | 2 | style="background:red; width:88.23%;" | 15 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:23.53%;" | 4 | style="background:red; width:76.47%;" | 13 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Southern District Council election
